name: Turkey Escape Trail Free
description:
It's time to save the turkeys from becoming dinner!

Turkey Escape Trail is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Everybody wants some turkey and you need to escape! Make your way past the hunters and farmers and make your way to freedom!

Collect acorns and power-ups along the way to help you out, or unlock other turkeys for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect acorns to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Turkey Escape Trail right now while it's 100% FREE!
